commit.message:
tree-phinodes.c (make_phi_node): Mark static.

2012-02-23  Bernhard Reutner-Fischer  <aldot@gcc.gnu.org>

	* tree-phinodes.c (make_phi_node): Mark static.
	* tree-flow.h (make_phi_node): Remove extern decl.
	* doc/gimple.texi (make_phi_node): Remove documentation.

From-SVN: r184545
